bs-exporttables-menu:
Short label for a button that opens a menu wich shows possible exportable table formats.
{{Identical|Export table}}
bs-exporttables-menu-csv:
Label for menu entry that exports a table to csv. Should contain the file extension.
{{Identical|Comma seperated values (CSV)}}
bs-exporttables-ve-exportable-option: Label for visual editor table option for exportable tables
